org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql
Class AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory
public class AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Provides factory access to InvocationHandler impls.

Nested Class Summary
private  class AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory.AeIgnoreCommitCloseConnectionProxyInvocationHandler
          Implements a method invocation handler that passes all method calls except commit() , rollback() and close() to an underlying JDBC connection.
private  class AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory.AeRestoreAutoCommitHandler
          Implements a method invocation handler that passes all method calls to an underlying JDBC connection but ensures that Connection.setAutoCommit(boolean) is set to true before Connection.close() is called.
private  class AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory.AeVerifyCommitOrRollbackInvocationHandler
          Implements a method invocation handler that passes all method calls to an underlying JDBC connection but verifies that either Connection.commit() or Connection.rollback() is called before Connection.close().

Method Detail

getInstance

public static AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory getInstance()
Returns singleton instance of the invocation handler factory.

getAutoCommitHandler

public java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler getAutoCommitHandler(java.sql.Connection aConnection)
Return the InvocationHandler implementation for the given JDBC connection. Minimally, the handler will ensure that the autoCommit property is set to true before Connection.close() is called.

getCommitControlHandler

public java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler getCommitControlHandler(java.sql.Connection aConnection,
                                                                   boolean aVerifyFlag)
Return the InvocationHandler implementation for the given JDBC connection. Minimally, the handler will ensure that the autoCommit property is set to true before Connection.close() is called. If the verify flag is true, then the handler will verify that either Connection.commit() or Connection.rollback() have been called before the connection is closed.

Parameters:
aConnection -
aVerifyFlag -

getIgnoreCommitCloseHandler

public java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler getIgnoreCommitCloseHandler(java.sql.Connection aConnection)
Return the InvocationHandler implementation for the given JDBC connection. This invocation handler passes all method calls except commit(), rollback() and close() to an underlying JDBC connection.

protected java.lang.reflect.Method getCloseMethod()
Returns the Method instance representing the Connection.close() method.

getRollbackMethod

getConnectionMethod

protected java.lang.reflect.Method getConnectionMethod(java.lang.String aName)
Returns the Method instance representing the specified method in the Connection interface.
